nodes.Description:
CWE-1037: Processor Optimization Removal or Modification of Security-critical Code
The developer builds a security-critical protection mechanism into the software, but the processor optimizes the execution of the program such that the mechanism is removed or modified.
nodes.label: Processor Optimization Removal or Modification of Security-critical Code

nodes.Description:
CWE-14: Compiler Removal of Code to Clear Buffers
Sensitive memory is cleared according to the source code, but compiler optimizations leave the memory untouched when it is not read from again, aka "dead store removal."
nodes.label: Compiler Removal of Code to Clear Buffers

nodes.Description:
CWE-1038: Insecure Automated Optimizations
The product uses a mechanism that automatically optimizes code, e.g. to improve a characteristic such as performance, but the optimizations can have an unintended side effect that might violate an intended security assumption.
nodes.label: Insecure Automated Optimizations

nodes.Description:
CWE-733: Compiler Optimization Removal or Modification of Security-critical Code
The developer builds a security-critical protection mechanism into the software, but the compiler optimizes the program such that the mechanism is removed or modified.
nodes.label: Compiler Optimization Removal or Modification of Security-critical Code
